 2004-09822004-09-01,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TB,  SGC, 
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAuthority for the CORRECTIONAL SERVICE OF CANADA to enter into an EXCHANGE OF SERVICES AGREEMENT with the Province of BRITISH COLUMBIA concerning the detention of offenders in each other's correctional facilities and the financial arrangements to be made in respect thereof.
